name: Dragon World
description: Dragon World is a fun dragon game in a cartoon style. Battle other players or play cooperative in a survival game mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600/AMD Phenom X3 8750 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260/Radeon HD 4870 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 512 MB available space
